cache_inode_create.c

Go to the documentation of this file.

00109 
00133 cache_entry_t * cache_inode_create( cache_entry_t            * pentry_parent, 
00134                                     fsal_name_t              * pname, 
00135                                     cache_inode_file_type_t    type,
00136                                     fsal_accessmode_t          mode,
00137                                     cache_inode_create_arg_t * pcreate_arg,
00138                                     fsal_attrib_list_t       * pattr, 
00139                                     hash_table_t             * ht,  
00140                                     cache_inode_client_t     * pclient, 
00141                                     fsal_op_context_t        * pcontext, 
00142                                     cache_inode_status_t     * pstatus )
00143 {
00144   cache_entry_t           * pentry = NULL ;
00145   fsal_status_t           fsal_status ;
00146 #ifdef _USE_MFSL
00147   mfsl_object_t           object_handle ;
00148 #else
00149   fsal_handle_t           object_handle ;
00150 #endif
00151   fsal_attrib_list_t      parent_attributes ;
00152   fsal_attrib_list_t      object_attributes ;
00153   fsal_handle_t           dir_handle ;
00154   cache_inode_fsal_data_t fsal_data ;
00155 
00156   /* Set the return default to CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS */
00157   *pstatus = CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS ;
00158   
00159   /* stats */
00160   pclient->stat.nb_call_total += 1 ;
00161   pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_call[CACHE_INODE_CREATE] += 1 ;
00162   
00163   /* Check if the required type is correct, with this function, we manage file, dir and symlink */
00164   if( type != REGULAR_FILE && type != DIR_BEGINNING && type != SYMBOLIC_LINK
00165       && type != SOCKET_FILE && type != FIFO_FILE && type != CHARACTER_FILE
00166       && type != BLOCK_FILE )
00167     {
00168       *pstatus = CACHE_INODE_BAD_TYPE ;
00169 
00170       /* stats */
00171       pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_err_unrecover[CACHE_INODE_CREATE] += 1 ;
00172       
00173       return NULL ;
00174     }
00175  
00176 
00177   /* Check if an entry of the same name exists */
00178   if( ( pentry = cache_inode_lookup( pentry_parent, 
00179                                      pname,
00180                                      &parent_attributes, 
00181                                      ht, 
00182                                      pclient, 
00183                                      pcontext, 
00184                                      pstatus ) ) != NULL )
00185     {
00186       *pstatus = CACHE_INODE_ENTRY_EXISTS ;
00187       
00188       if( pentry->internal_md.type != type )
00189         {
00190           /* Incompatible types, returns NULL */
00191           
00192           /* stats */
00193           pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_err_unrecover[CACHE_INODE_CREATE] += 1 ;
00194 
00195           return NULL ;
00196         }
00197       else
00198         {
00199           /* stats */
00200           pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_success[CACHE_INODE_CREATE] += 1 ;
00201       
00202           /* redondant creation, returned the previously created entry */
00203           return pentry ;
00204         }
00205     }
00206 
00207   /* At this point, the entry was not found, this means that is doesn't exist is FSAL, we can create it */
00208 
00209 
00210   /* Get the lock for the parent*/
00211    P_w( &pentry_parent->lock ) ;
00212 
00213    if( pentry_parent->internal_md.type == DIR_BEGINNING )
00214      dir_handle = pentry_parent->object.dir_begin.handle ;
00215    
00216    if( pentry_parent->internal_md.type == DIR_CONTINUE )
00217      {
00218        P_r( &pentry_parent->object.dir_cont.pdir_begin->lock ) ;
00219        dir_handle = pentry_parent->object.dir_cont.pdir_begin->object.dir_begin.handle ;
00220        V_r( &pentry_parent->object.dir_cont.pdir_begin->lock ) ;
00221      }
00222    
00223    object_attributes.asked_attributes = pclient->attrmask  ;
00224    switch( type )
00225      {
00226      case REGULAR_FILE: 
00227 #ifdef _USE_MFSL
00228        fsal_status = MFSL_create( &pentry_parent->mobject,
00229                                   pname, 
00230                                   pcontext,  
00231                                   &pclient->mfsl_context,
00232                                   mode, 
00233                                   &object_handle, 
00234                                   &object_attributes ) ;
00235 #else
00236        fsal_status = FSAL_create( &dir_handle,
00237                                   pname, 
00238                                   pcontext,  
00239                                   mode, 
00240                                   &object_handle, 
00241                                   &object_attributes ) ;
00242 #endif
00243        break ; 
00244        
00245      case DIR_BEGINNING:
00246 #ifdef _USE_MFSL
00247        fsal_status = MFSL_mkdir( &pentry_parent->mobject,
00248                                  pname, 
00249                                  pcontext,
00250                                  &pclient->mfsl_context,
00251                                  mode, 
00252                                  &object_handle, 
00253                                  &object_attributes ) ;
00254 #else
00255        fsal_status = FSAL_mkdir( &dir_handle,
00256                                  pname, 
00257                                  pcontext,
00258                                  mode, 
00259                                  &object_handle, 
00260                                  &object_attributes ) ;
00261 #endif
00262        break ;
00263        
00264      case SYMBOLIC_LINK:
00265 #ifdef _USE_MFSL
00266        fsal_status = MFSL_symlink( &pentry_parent->mobject,
00267                                    pname, 
00268                                    &pcreate_arg->link_content,
00269                                    pcontext, 
00270                                    &pclient->mfsl_context,
00271                                    mode, 
00272                                    &object_handle, 
00273                                    &object_attributes ) ;
00274 #else
00275        fsal_status = FSAL_symlink( &dir_handle,
00276                                    pname, 
00277                                    &pcreate_arg->link_content,
00278                                    pcontext, 
00279                                    mode, 
00280                                    &object_handle, 
00281                                    &object_attributes ) ;
00282 #endif
00283        break ;
00284      
00285      case SOCKET_FILE:
00286 #ifdef _USE_MFSL
00287        fsal_status = MFSL_mknode( &pentry_parent->mobject,
00288                                   pname,
00289                                   pcontext,
00290                                   &pclient->mfsl_context,
00291                                   mode,
00292                                   FSAL_TYPE_SOCK,
00293                                   NULL, /* no dev_t needed for socket file */
00294                                   &object_handle, 
00295                                   &object_attributes ) ;
00296 #else
00297        fsal_status = FSAL_mknode( &dir_handle,
00298                                   pname,
00299                                   pcontext,
00300                                   mode,
00301                                   FSAL_TYPE_SOCK,
00302                                   NULL, /* no dev_t needed for socket file */
00303                                   &object_handle, 
00304                                   &object_attributes ) ;
00305 #endif
00306        break ;
00307                                   
00308      case FIFO_FILE:
00309 #ifdef _USE_MFSL
00310        fsal_status = MFSL_mknode( &pentry_parent->mobject,
00311                                   pname,
00312                                   pcontext,
00313                                   &pclient->mfsl_context,
00314                                   mode,
00315                                   FSAL_TYPE_FIFO,
00316                                   NULL, /* no dev_t needed for FIFO file */
00317                                   &object_handle, 
00318                                   &object_attributes ) ;
00319 #else
00320        fsal_status = FSAL_mknode( &dir_handle,
00321                                   pname,
00322                                   pcontext,
00323                                   mode,
00324                                   FSAL_TYPE_FIFO,
00325                                   NULL, /* no dev_t needed for FIFO file */
00326                                   &object_handle, 
00327                                   &object_attributes ) ;
00328 #endif
00329        break ;
00330 
00331      case BLOCK_FILE:
00332 #ifdef _USE_MFSL
00333        fsal_status = MFSL_mknode( &pentry_parent->mobject,
00334                                   pname,
00335                                   pcontext,
00336                                   &pclient->mfsl_context,
00337                                   mode,
00338                                   FSAL_TYPE_BLK,
00339                                   &pcreate_arg->dev_spec,
00340                                   &object_handle, 
00341                                   &object_attributes ) ;
00342 #else
00343        fsal_status = FSAL_mknode( &dir_handle,
00344                                   pname,
00345                                   pcontext,
00346                                   mode,
00347                                   FSAL_TYPE_BLK,
00348                                   &pcreate_arg->dev_spec,
00349                                   &object_handle, 
00350                                   &object_attributes ) ;
00351 #endif
00352        break ;
00353 
00354      case CHARACTER_FILE:
00355 #ifdef _USE_MFSL
00356        fsal_status = MFSL_mknode( &pentry_parent->mobject,
00357                                   pname,
00358                                   pcontext,
00359                                   &pclient->mfsl_context,
00360                                   mode,
00361                                   FSAL_TYPE_CHR,
00362                                   &pcreate_arg->dev_spec,
00363                                   &object_handle, 
00364                                   &object_attributes ) ;
00365 #else
00366        fsal_status = FSAL_mknode( &dir_handle,
00367                                   pname,
00368                                   pcontext,
00369                                   mode,
00370                                   FSAL_TYPE_CHR,
00371                                   &pcreate_arg->dev_spec,
00372                                   &object_handle, 
00373                                   &object_attributes ) ;
00374 #endif
00375        break ;
00376        
00377      default:
00378        /* we should never go there */
00379        *pstatus = CACHE_INODE_INCONSISTENT_ENTRY ;
00380        V_w( &pentry_parent->lock ) ;
00381 
00382          /* stats */
00383        pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_err_unrecover[CACHE_INODE_CREATE] += 1 ;
00384 
00385        return NULL ;
00386        break ;
00387      }
00388    
00389    /* Check for the result */
00390    if( FSAL_IS_ERROR( fsal_status ) ) 
00391      {
00392        *pstatus = cache_inode_error_convert( fsal_status ) ;
00393        V_w( &pentry_parent->lock ) ;
00394 
00395        if( fsal_status.major == ERR_FSAL_STALE )
00396         {
00397           cache_inode_status_t kill_status ;
00398 
00399           DisplayLog( "cache_inode_create: Stale FSAL File Handle detected for pentry = %p", pentry_parent ) ;
00400 
00401           if( cache_inode_kill_entry( pentry_parent, ht, pclient, &kill_status ) != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00402             DisplayLog( "cache_inode_create: Could not kill entry %p, status = %u", pentry_parent, kill_status ) ;
00403 
00404           *pstatus = CACHE_INODE_FSAL_ESTALE ;
00405         }
00406 
00407        /* stats */
00408        pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_err_unrecover[CACHE_INODE_CREATE] += 1 ;
00409            
00410        return NULL ;
00411      }
00412    else
00413      { 
00414 #ifdef _USE_MFSL
00415        fsal_data.handle = object_handle.handle ;
00416 #else
00417        fsal_data.handle = object_handle ;
00418 #endif
00419        fsal_data.cookie = DIR_START ;
00420 
00421        /* This call will return NULL if failed */
00422        if( ( pentry = cache_inode_new_entry( &fsal_data, 
00423                                              &object_attributes,
00424                                              type, 
00425                                              pcreate_arg,
00426                                              NULL, 
00427                                              ht, 
00428                                              pclient, 
00429                                              pcontext, 
00430                                              TRUE, /* This is a creation and not a population */
00431                                              pstatus ) ) == NULL )
00432          {
00433            *pstatus = CACHE_INODE_INSERT_ERROR ;
00434            V_w( &pentry_parent->lock ) ;
00435           
00436            /* stats */
00437            pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_err_unrecover[CACHE_INODE_CREATE] += 1 ;
00438 
00439            return NULL ;
00440          }
00441 
00442        /* Add this entry to the directory */
00443        if( cache_inode_add_cached_dirent( pentry_parent,
00444                                           pname, 
00445                                           pentry, 
00446                                           NULL,
00447                                           ht,
00448                                           pclient,
00449                                           pcontext,
00450                                           pstatus ) != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS ) 
00451          {
00452            V_w( &pentry_parent->lock ) ;
00453 
00454            /* stats */
00455            pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_err_unrecover[CACHE_INODE_CREATE] += 1 ;
00456 
00457            return NULL ;
00458          }  
00459      }
00460 
00461    /* Update the parent cached attributes */
00462    if( pentry_parent->internal_md.type == DIR_BEGINNING )
00463      {
00464        pentry_parent->object.dir_begin.attributes.mtime.seconds  = time( NULL ) ;
00465        pentry_parent->object.dir_begin.attributes.mtime.nseconds = 0 ;
00466        pentry_parent->object.dir_begin.attributes.ctime = pentry_parent->object.dir_begin.attributes.mtime ;
00467        
00468        /* if the created object is a directory, it contains a link
00469         * to its parent : '..'. Thus the numlink attr must be increased.
00470         */
00471        if ( type == DIR_BEGINNING )
00472        {
00473          pentry_parent->object.dir_begin.attributes.numlinks ++;
00474        }
00475        
00476      }
00477    else
00478      {
00479        /* DIR_CONTINUE */
00480        pentry_parent->object.dir_cont.pdir_begin->object.dir_begin.attributes.mtime.seconds  = time( NULL ) ;
00481        pentry_parent->object.dir_cont.pdir_begin->object.dir_begin.attributes.mtime.seconds  = 0 ;
00482        pentry_parent->object.dir_cont.pdir_begin->object.dir_begin.attributes.ctime = 
00483          pentry_parent->object.dir_cont.pdir_begin->object.dir_begin.attributes.mtime ;
00484        
00485        /* if the created object is a directory, it contains a link
00486         * to its parent : '..'. Thus the numlink attr must be increased.
00487         */
00488        if ( type == DIR_BEGINNING )
00489        {
00490          pentry_parent->object.dir_cont.pdir_begin->object.dir_begin.attributes.numlinks ++;
00491        }
00492 
00493      }
00494    
00495    
00496    /* Get the attributes in return */
00497    *pattr = object_attributes ;
00498 
00499    /* valid the parent */
00500    *pstatus = cache_inode_valid( pentry_parent, CACHE_INODE_OP_SET, pclient ) ;  
00501    
00502    /* release the lock for the parent*/
00503    V_w( &pentry_parent->lock ) ;
00504 
00505    /* stat */
00506    if( *pstatus != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00507      pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_err_retryable[CACHE_INODE_CREATE] += 1 ;
00508    else
00509      pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_success[CACHE_INODE_CREATE] += 1 ;
00510  
00511   return pentry ;
00512 } /* cache_inode_create */
00513 
00538 cache_entry_t * cache_inode_create_open( cache_entry_t           * pentry_parent, 
00539                                         fsal_name_t              * pname, 
00540                                         cache_inode_file_type_t    type,
00541                                         fsal_accessmode_t          mode,
00542                                         cache_inode_create_arg_t * pcreate_arg,
00543                                         fsal_openflags_t           openflags,
00544                                         fsal_attrib_list_t       * pattr, 
00545                                         hash_table_t             * ht,  
00546                                         cache_inode_client_t     * pclient, 
00547                                         fsal_op_context_t        * pcontext, 
00548                                         cache_inode_status_t     * pstatus )
00549 {
00550   return NULL ;
00551 } /* cache_inode_create */
